trans-unit.source: Indicates that any private members contained in an assembly's types are not available to reflection.
trans-unit.target: 表示包含在組件類型中的任何私用成員不可用於反映。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, reflection methods, such a <xref:System.Type.GetMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, can be used to get information about private members at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，反映方法，這類<xref:System.Type.GetMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，可用來在執行階段取得私用成員的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: When applies to an assembly, the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisablePrivateReflectionAttribute> attribute makes information about private members in that assembly's types unavailable to runtime reflection.
trans-unit.target: 當套用至組件，<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisablePrivateReflectionAttribute>屬性使私用成員的相關資訊，因為組件的類型無法供執行階段反映。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instances of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisablePrivateReflectionAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisablePrivateReflectionAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。
